overview: The Digital Experience Healthcare homepage provides a responsive, accessible landing page with navigation, hero content, informational sections, and clear calls to action. It includes a theme toggle, skip link, and structured semantic HTML for accessibility and SEO.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with brand and menu
Hero section with heading and description
Introduction section with three informational cards
Call-to-action section with service and contact links
interactions: Clicking navigation links routes to other pages
Theme toggle button changes dark/light mode state
Skip link jumps focus to main content
CTA buttons navigate to service and contact pages
data_flow: Theme toggle likely updates DOM class or local storage (not shown in snippet)
Navigation links trigger full page reloads to static routes
accessibility: ARIA labels on navigation and buttons
Semantic headings and landmarks (header, main, footer)
analytics: Potential click tracking on CTA buttons
Navigation link interactions may be tracked
Theme toggle usage could be logged for user preference analytics
test_ideas: Verify skip link moves focus to #main-content
Validate navbar links navigate to correct routes

Ensure hero and intro sections render correct text content
